title: Google\Cloud\OsConfig\V1\ZypperSettings
name: ZypperSettings
description:
Zypper patching is performed by running zypper patch.

See also https://en.opensuse.org/SDB:Zypper_manual.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.osconfig.v1.ZypperSettings

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.categories
params.description: Install only patches with these categories. Common categories include security, recommended, and feature.

params.name: data.severities
params.description: Install only patches with these severities. Common severities include critical, important, moderate, and low.

params.name: data.excludes
params.description: List of patches to exclude from update.

params.name: data.exclusive_patches
params.description: An exclusive list of patches to be updated. These are the only patches that will be installed using 'zypper patch patch:' command. This field must not be used with any other patch configuration fields.

methods.name: getWithOptional
methods.description:
